give user admin access:

update auth.users
set raw_app_meta_data = jsonb_set(
  raw_app_meta_data,
  '{role}',
  '"admin"',
  true
)
where email = 'USERS_EMAIL';




check users access rights:

select email, raw_app_meta_data
from auth.users
where email = 'biochemprotocols@gmail.com';




Stripe canonical test card (creditcard for sandbox testing):
4242 4242 4242 4242
Any future date
Any CVC
Any ZIP
